oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cauliflower and leeks to have company in the field
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kristensen, Hanne L.
Hansen, Janne
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Organic vegetables may benefit from the growing of living mulch crops between crop rows. Scientists from four EU countries are looking for potential positive effects.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kristensen, Hanne L. and Hansen, Janne (2012) Cauliflower and leeks to have company in the field. .
